```{r setup, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
source(file.path("R","build_panel.R"))
```

## Reproduce

```{r}
panel <- build_panel(years = 2016:2022, download = TRUE)
res   <- estimate_models(panel, output_dir = "outputs")
save_figures(panel, res$models, output_dir = "outputs")
```

This report is a simple wrapper around the pipeline. For the CLI workflow, run:

```bash
Rscript scripts/run_all.R
```
